feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 08:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023
